text.content:
Why AI Won't Replace You (But AI-Powered Creators Will)

I see this debate everywhere:
"Will AI replace content creators?"

Wrong question.

AI won't replace you.
But creators who use AI will replace creators who don't.

Here's why:

1. AI removes the blank page problem
2. AI handles research in seconds
3. AI helps you post consistently

But AI can't:
‚Üí Tell YOUR stories
‚Üí Have YOUR experiences
‚Üí Build YOUR relationships

The future belongs to creators who use AI as their co-pilot, not their replacement.

Are you using AI to accelerate your content? Or are you still doing everything manually?

"I'm talking to solo founders (under $100K revenue) who are drowning in manual tasks and believe they need to hire a team to scale. They need to hear that AI can be their first 'hire' and save them 20+ hours per week."

text.content: Use this prompt to create scroll-stopping hooks that challenge conventional wisdom.

text.content:
I need a contrarian opinion hook for a LinkedIn post.

Topic: [YOUR TOPIC]
Common belief: [WHAT MOST PEOPLE THINK]
Your contrarian take: [YOUR DIFFERENT VIEW]

Generate 5 hook options that:
1. Challenge the common belief directly
2. Create curiosity and pattern interrupt
3. Are under 12 words
4. Sound like this voice: [PASTE YOUR VOICE PROFILE]

Format as:
Hook 1: [text]
Why it works: [brief explanation]

Hook 2: [text]
Why it works: [brief explanation]
...
